channel.title: Adding animation for pots (so people see) on EasyRSC + webclient
channel.description:
Anyone able to help me do a webclient? and show how to let other people see when you pot?
Also a Offer x amount for gold etc?
thanks guys

item.title: Adding animation for pots (so people see) on EasyRSC + webclient
item.dc:creator: @The_Djinn The Djinn
item.description:
@The_Djinn wrote:

Moparclassic’s method for a webclient/downloading/updating the cache would be much easier and take about 15 minutes to implement, or less.

Read full topic
